about_the_game:
" The Search for Fran "
Created by : Archor Wright
-------------------------------
Welcome to the City Park. Your name is Remis Vancosid, You are here to search for Fran.
While searching, You can also talk with people and go on Quests , Collect Glorbs , Throw a Ball , Drive a Car , Fly a Ship , Fix Traffic Jams, Try a "Challenge" (See Below) and much more !

* NOTE: Try to Collect ALL GLORBS and Complete ALL QUESTS *

-------------------------------
*** Challenges ***
"Easter Egg" Challenge - How many Archor Games Logos Appear in the Game ?
"Speed Run" Challenge - What is the Fastest Time You can find Fran ?
"Scenic" Pictures Challenge - Take Screenshots of the Beautiful Area and share them on Social Media with Your Friends.
"Walkthrough" Challenge - Post a video of a Complete 'Walkthrough' of the entire Game.
Walk Don't Run Challenge - Only Walk (No Sprinting) and No "High/Sprint" Jumps for the Entire Game and Post Your Full Video online.
Walky-Talky Challenge - can You find every NPC in the Game ? How Many Total are there ?

"Steamy Streamer" Challenge - Get ALL of the Archor Games products available on Steam and Stream ALL of them.

"IRL ARG" Challenge - This game and some other ARCHOR GAMES are part of an "Alternate Reality Game" "In Real Life" Challenge, be sure to check out ALL of our games for Clues to the Mystery.


NEWS !

In Real Life "The Search for Fran" T-Shirt Challenge ! ! !
http://youtube.com/clip/Ugkxk-k9XxGldT4AJjhdkg1TciF2fbNuhgjT

Be sure to get Your "The Search for Fran" shirt on Bonfire !
http://bonfire.com/the-search-for-fran

Also, Be sure to check out the 'Side-Quest' Game " The Search for MR Fimple " on STEAM !
http://store.steampowered.com/app/1835640/The_Search_for_MR_Fimple

name: The Search For Fran

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel or AMD
  • Graphics: Nvidia or AMD
  • DirectX: Version 12

reviews:
“WOW”
8/10 – Joeseppi

“FUN”
69 GLORBS – moistcr1tikal / penguinz0

“Good Game”
Great – Remis Vancosid
